input_text:
Job Title: Product Marketing Manager, Alliances

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Come join the leader in data security. Varonis is the only public data security company with over 7,000+ customers who trust us to protect their most valuable data against cyberattacks. We’re looking for an Alliances Marketing Manager to build and execute joint go-to-market plans with key strategic partners.

The Alliances Marketing Manager will work hand-in-hand with our strategic alliances team and broader marketing team to create and execute a strong “better together” GTM strategy. This role will be responsible for developing joint collateral, creating enablement materials, identifying event opportunities, and working alongside our partner development managers to strengthen our alliance partnerships. Experience working with Microsoft, AWS, or Salesforce is strongly preferred.

Responsibilities:

 Create joint content that reinforces the “better together” story, including joint datasheets, webinars, thought leadership whitepapers, blog posts, and videos Work directly with alliance partners and the broader marketing team to develop and execute joint GTM plans Identify opportunities to co-market Varonis’ product offerings, enablement resources, and marketing materials Manage marketing development funds and measure the effectiveness of joint campaigns Identify strategic alliances programs that we would be eligible for and work cross-functionally to manage requirements and submissions Identify alliance event opportunities and represent Varonis at tradeshows, events, etc.


The ideal candidate has:

 3+ years in alliance or partner marketing A proven track record of working with Microsoft and AWS Experience in cybersecurity A highly organized, communicative, and self-starting work styleStrong writing skillsTechnical acumen


This position is remote with travel requirements to Varonis HQ in New York City, tradeshows, events, and other alliance-building activities.

We invite you to check out our Instagram Page to gain further insight into the Varonis culture! @VaronisLife

Varonis is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other legally protected characteristics.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
